definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: How long have you been waiting to finally have sex with your girlfriend?
sentences.chinese: 你在最終和你女朋友發生性關係前等了有多久？

sentences.english: It didn't take long for Zimmer to realize he had landed on a school of crappie.
sentences.chinese: 它沒有多久齊默實現他對學校的克拉皮降落。

sentences.english: But the alibi did not hold up long.
sentences.chinese: 但是，不在場證明沒堅持多久。

sentences.english: How Long Can a Person Survive Without Water?
sentences.chinese: 一個人沒有水可以活多久？

sentences.english: So, how long are you staying in Wilmington?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，你要在威爾明頓待多久？

sentences.english: How long must the iron-hearted monster feed on our life's blood?
sentences.chinese: 這鐵石心腸的怪物吸着我們的血液，還得吸多久呢？

sentences.english: How long will that special date? Llama Llama has to wait.
sentences.chinese: 多久纔到這個特別的日子？羊駝拉瑪要等待。

sentences.english: Days after Alexander's death, she had Stateira poisoned.
sentences.chinese: 亞歷山大死後沒多久，她毒死了斯塔蒂娜。

sentences.english: How long is the period of recovery for "Novel Painless Sciton Dermabrasion"?
I don't know how long I'll have to play and practice before I can gain that kind of skills.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的絕活不知道要練多久才能到家和隨心應手？

sentences.english: I'll always rember that I've loved U.
sentences.chinese: 即使不管多久，我一直記得我們曾經相愛過。

sentences.english: How often do you practice together?
sentences.chinese: 你們通常多久會一起練團一次？

sentences.english: How many times must the cannonballs fly.
How long will the earth fall?
Before long af armer woke him up.
sentences.chinese: 沒過多久，一個農夫叫醒了他。

sentences.english: Sam:How long am i gonna be on double-secret probation?
sentences.chinese: 我還要接受你這種雙重機密對待多久？

definition: a while/a spell/a short time/a burst
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
a few years/several years/how many years
a moment/a while/in a moment/also pr. [yi1 hui3]
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
a moment/a while/in a moment/now...now.../also pr. [yi1 hui3 r5]
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
